enWisdom: Greed is a symbol of the wretched
Greed and gluttony earn wretchedness and humiliation

Wisdom: الْحَرِيصُ أَسِيرُ مَهَانَةٍ لَا يُفَكُّ أَسْرُهُ
enWisdom: The greedy one is a prisoner of disgrace, never to be freed from his prison
Greed is a disgrace and a humiliation for the one who espouses it
Greed is one of the two miseries

Wisdom: الْحِرْصُ لَا يَزِيدُ فِي الرِّزْقِ وَلَكِنْ يُذِلُّ الْقَدْرَ
enWisdom: Greed does not increase sustenance, rather it debases one’s status

Wisdom: اتَّقُوا الْحِرْصَ فَإِنَّ صَاحِبَهُ [مُصَاحِبَهُ‏] رَهِينُ ذُلٍّ وَعَنَاءٍ
enWisdom: Be cautious of greed, for its possessor is subject to humiliation and suffering

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْحِرْصَ فَإِنَّهُ شَيْنُ الدِّينِ وَبِئْسَ الْقَرِينُ
enWisdom: Be wary of greed, for it is a disgrace to the religion and the worst companion

Wisdom: أَعْظَمُ النَّاسِ ذُلًّا الطَّامِعُ الْحَرِيصُ الْمُرِيبُ
enWisdom: The most humiliated of all people is the greedy, suspicious, coveter

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ مُدْرِكٌ قِسْمَكَ وَمَضْمُونٌ رِزْقُكَ مُسْتَوْفٍ مَا كُتِبَ لَكَ فَأَرِحْ نَفْسَكَ مِنْ شَقَاءِ الْحِرْصِ وَمَذَلَّةِ الطَّلَبِ وَثِقْ بِاللَّهِ وَخَفِّضْ فِي الْمُكْتَسَبِ
enWisdom: Verily you will acquire your share your sustenance is guaranteed and that which has been decreed for you will be fulfilled, so spare yourself the trouble of the wretchedness of greed and the humiliation of seeking [from others]; trust in Allah and take it easy in your earning
The slave of greed is eternally wretched
One whose greed increases, his status is lowered

Wisdom: مَنْ غَلَبَ عَلَيْهِ الْحِرْصُ عَظُمَتْ ذِلَّتُهُ
enWisdom: One who is overcome by greed faces great humiliation
One whose greed increases, his wretchedness [also] increases
Nothing debases the self like greed
One who acts greedily is wretched and dispraised

Wisdom: لَا تُمَلِّكْ نَفْسَكَ بِغُرُورِ الطَّمَعِ وَلَا تُجِبْ دَوَاعِيَ الشَّرَهِ
enWisdom: Do not surrender yourself to the deception of covetousness and do not respond to the call of greed, for indeed these two [traits] reap wretchedness and disgrace
